## DynVar.unbind() method

Attempts to end the current scope by restoring this var's bound value to that of parent scope. An error is thrown if attempting to remove the root binding.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unbind(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
